name: nogrod/dhl-retoure-php-sdk
description: # Introduction ## Overview                  Note:   This is the specification of the DP-DHL Group Parcel DE Returns API. This web service allows business customers to create return labels on demand.  # Scenarios ## Main Scenario: Creating a returnlabel This is achieved by posting a return order to the URI '/rest/orders'. The service will respond with a return label. ## Querying to get receiver locations The single scenario supported by this service is the determination of the receiver's location. This is achieved by getting a location to the URI '/rest/locations'. The service will respond with a Receiver.
